channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Confined Space Rescue; INC#1245; 06:09PM; 18900 W Knapp St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3nnQCuv; #Northridge; Homeowner stated 50 year-old male plumber entered crawlspace in (3 foot maximimum) raised foundation beneath their 2,100 square foot one-story home (built 1958), as many as three hours prior, and was not seen or heard from since, and not responsive to homeowner shouts or noise. LAFD crews, including those specially trained and equipped in Urban Search & Rescue arrived quickly to ventilate and monitor the enclosed environment, and soon visibly noted a small portion of the still unresponsive worker's body at a distance. Firefighters cutting the second of two holes in the home's floor with chainsaws to gain best access, and to assist in his efficient removal, awakened the sleeping worker, who soon thereafter crawled from beneath the home uninjured. LAFD crews are now medically evaluating the plumber, who does not appear in need of ambulance transportation.; FS 70; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC12 BC14 BC15 E103 E273 E288 E289 E70 E88 EM15 HR3 RA104 RA87 RA889 RA89 T73 T88 T89 UR88 UR89; CH8; 13; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#1214; 06:15PM; 3571 N Berry Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3z3EnWF; #StudioCity; 34 Firefighters took just 32 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish stubborn flames within a two story garage attached to a one-story home. One adult female civilian (unknown age / gender / condition/ site affiliation / circumstances) has been transported to an area hospital for a yet to be determined medical need. No other injuries reported. Fire cause under active investigation.; FS 97; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC14 E260 E278 E60 E86 RA60 RA97 T60 T78; CH9; 18; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#1214; 05:43PM; 3571 N Berry Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3z3EnWF; #StudioCity; PRELIM: Fire in a two story garage (attached to?) a one-story home. One adult female civilian currently being evaluated at scene for undetermined medical needs.; FS 97; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC14 E260 E278 E60 E86 RA97 T60 T78; CH9; 18; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Update Traffic Collision with Entrapment 03/25/2023 INC#0297

item.description: Update Traffic Collision with Entrapment; INC#0297; 06:55AM; WB 10 Fwy east of Crenshaw Blvd; MAP: https://bit.ly/2OMPorQ; #MidCity; Two vehicle apparent head-on collision between a work truck with three adult male occupants, and a sedan with one adult female occupant, the work truck found overturned with the driver trapped. All *four* patients (no further details) transported to a regional trauma center by LAFD Paramedics. #LATtraffic: Closure of one or more lanes until CHP operations are complete, unknown duration. Motorists, expect congestion and delay, avoid the immediate area and consider an alternate route. Monitor @CHP_LA_TRAFFIC on Twitter ( https://twitter.com/CHP_LA_TRAFFIC ) and traffic reports on news radio. Media Inquiries: CHP Log#0592; FS 26; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; BC11 E226 E229 E26 E29 EM11 HR3 RA26 RA29 RA34 RA826 T26 T29; CH7; 13; Brian Humphrey

Traffic Collision with Entrapment; INC#0297; 06:08AM; WB 10 Fwy east of Crenshaw Blvd; MAP: https://bit.ly/2OMPorQ; #MidCity; PRELIM: Multi-vehicle collision with one vehicle overturned and one patient trapped, now freed. Three patients (no details) transported to a regional trauma center. #LATtraffic: Closure of one or more lanes until CHP operations are complete, unknown duration. Motorists, expect congestion and delay, avoid the immediate area and consider an alternate route. Monitor @CHP_LA_TRAFFIC on Twitter ( https://twitter.com/CHP_LA_TRAFFIC ) and traffic reports on news radio. Media Inquiries: CHP Central LA Log #0592; FS 26; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; BC11 E226 E229 E26 E29 EM11 HR3 RA26 RA29 RA34 RA826 T26 T29; CH7; 13; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#1647; 09:51PM; 8165 W Tianna Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3TKGB6T; #HollywoodHills West; 44 LAFD Firefighters took just 32 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish heavy fire that extended from a well involved garage into the attic of an attached 2,362 square foot one-story home. No injuries reported. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 97; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC14 E108 E260 E278 E288 E41 E97 RA41 RA97 T60 T78 T88; CH9; 18; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Update Structure Fire Correction - Firefight Continues (No Knockdown) 03/24/2023 INC#1647

item.description: Update Correction - Firefight Continues (No Knockdown) Structure Fire; INC#1647; 09:40PM; 8165 W Tianna Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3TKGB6T; #HollywoodHills West; 44 Firefighters continue to offensively battle flames that have extended from the well involved garage into the attic of the attached 2,362 square foot one-story home. No injuries reported.; FS 97; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC14 E108 E260 E278 E288 E41 E97 RA41 RA97 T60 T78 T88; CH9; 18; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#1647; 09:19PM; 8165 W Tianna Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3TKGB6T; #HollywoodHills West; PRELIM: Garage well involved with fire, threatening attached one story home.; FS 97; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC14 E108 E260 E278 E288 E41 E97 RA97 T60 T78 T88 ; CH9; 18; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Structure Fire - FIRE NOW OUT 03/23/2023 INC#1597

item.description: Structure Fire - FIRE NOW OUT; INC#1597; 11:06PM; 1807 N Kenmore Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3JJxAWQ; Los Feliz; At 10:51PM, firefighters responded to a reported structure fire. Upon arrival they found a two story duplex with smoke showing from the attic. After conducting an offensive fire attack, crews extinguished the fire in 22 minutes with no injuries reported. One additional building was exposed but the fire was contained to the unit of origin. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details; FS 35; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC5 E227 E235 E35 E56 E82 RA35 T27 T35; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0662; 12:17PM; 7727 N Lankershim Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/40gnELB; Sun Valley; KNOCKDOWN: Over 80 firefighters extinguished the fire in 33 minutes. The flames were out the 2nd floor window and lapping up to the 3rd floor upon LAFD arrival. Firefighters conducted an interior attack on both floors and primarily held the blaze to the unit of origin. The extent of damage to the unit above is being determined. Two patients were transported with serious burn injuries. A thorough search of the involved units and the rest of the floors impacted by the smoke is underway to determine if any other occupants require medical attention. Per protocol for burn injuries, LAFD Arson section is responding for the investigation. LAFD PIOs are enroute for media availability. No further details.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; AP7 BC10 BC12 BC14 BC15 BC5 CM40 CM42 E239 E278 E298 E5 E86 E89 E97 E98 EA1 EM12 EM17 EM18 HR3 PI1 PI2 RA60 RA75 RA77 RA839 RA881 RA889 RA97 RA98 T39 T60 T78 T98 UR5 UR88; CH9; 14 15 18; Margaret Stewart
